review: Doctor is helpful with her advice. She was polite to respond to our questions and did give enough time to solve our doubts. Staffs were helpful too with us but I did notice some non co-operation of nursing staff with other patients. My experience was good with the doctor. I will recommend to my known ones.

My dad had been to hospital and it was for heart blockage. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. My father is satisfied with the explanation given by the doctor. We consulted related to surgery. Doctor checked old reports. There was no waiting time in the hospital. His health is improved. My dad had fatigue. Diet chart was suggested to follow and his health is improved. We have plans to do surgery soon and it's getting delayed.
Ma'am is very friendly and listens to all your problems and her experience is really reflecting in her work.  I would definitely recommend her to everyone for cardiology.

I know her for the past 7 years. She treated my mom for her heart problems. She is very patient in listening to patients. She is positive and friendly. The most important thing is she always answers whenever I call for emergency. Most doctors don't.
Very Nice. **** *********. Very patient and practical.  Very much satisfied. Explained well. Will surely recommend others too.
